content: this is a beautiful set of mitts and surprising quick and easy to make made using a simple rib so that they grip gently around the wrist and basic crochet stitches very simple decrease repeat and lovingly described instructions for finishing off made in one piece there are no seams to match up and sew 3 page written pattern beginner/intermediate level © teri hamilton crochet@teri s 2024 this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is permitted to make items from this pattern provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
